org.osate.ge.palette

Interface PaletteCommand

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CreateConnectionPaletteCommand, TargetedPaletteCommand
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasePaletteCommand

    public interface PaletteCommand
    Base interface for all palettte commands. In general, TargetedPaletteCommand and CreateConnectionPaletteCommand should be implemented.
    Since:
    2.0
    No Extend:
    This class is not intended to be subclassed by clients.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getCategoryId()
      Returns a category ID for the command.
      java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getIconId()
      Returns an icon to display for the command.
      java.lang.String getLabel()
      Returns a label to be used in the user interface for the command.

    • Method Detail

      • getCategoryId

        java.lang.String getCategoryId()
        Returns a category ID for the command.
        Returns:
        the id of the category used to group the command. Must not return null.

      • getLabel

        java.lang.String getLabel()
        Returns a label to be used in the user interface for the command.
        Returns:
        the label for the command.

      • getIconId

        java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getIconId()
        Returns an icon to display for the command.
        Returns:
        an optional describing the icon used for the command.
